text: Noah Cameron Schnapp (born October 3, 2004) is a Canadian-American actor. Since 2016, he has appeared as Will Byers in the Netflix series Stranger Things. He also voiced Charlie Brown in The Peanuts Movie (2015). Schnapp was born in New York City, New York, U.S. His parents are from Montreal, Quebec, Canada. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2004 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American TikTokers
title: Noah Schnapp
